title: Are we still able to get hextech chests or is it disabled?
body: Either im just really bad or i cant get hextech chests on alpha client and legacy. I'm always getting key frags though lol. Rito pls reply ;w; dar is a citizen in need a hero must help <3 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Yup, you're still able to nab Hextech Chests for showing your sweet moves in-game and earning an S- or better grade for your performance in the match. You can also earn a chest if someone in your premade earns an S- or better grade, so long as you hadn't earned a chest on the champion you were playing. Check out our [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more info, let me know if you have any other questions.

Oooh if you didnt get one on the champion you were playing XD that makes more sense to me now! Lol i've been playing alot of lux doing 360 nerskerpz on ppl XD Thanks Targons Blade! ~Sincerely A Bagel -3- (P.S Your My Hero! <3)

Lux is a ton of fun, especially on ARAM/Poro King! I prefer to play super tanky champs tho, since every team can benefit from a tank, plus Mecha Malphite and his chromas are pretty intimidating!

Good luck out there, I hope you get all the hextech chests! :P
